Orage PI zero.

root@orangepizero:~# less /etc/armbian-image-release
# PLEASE DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
BOARD=orangepizero
BOARD_NAME="Orange Pi Zero"
BOARDFAMILY=sun8i
VERSION=5.38
LINUXFAMILY=sunxi
BRANCH=next
ARCH=arm
IMAGE_TYPE=user-built
BOARD_TYPE=conf
INITRD_ARCH=arm
KERNEL_IMAGE_TYPE=zImage


Install:

apt-get update
apt install python-pip
or
apt install python3-pip

pip install --upgrade OPi.GPIO
or
pip3 install --upgrade OPi.GPIO

python http2.py
or
python3 http3.py


curl -d "green=off&red=off" http://192.168.1.100
curl -d "green=on&red=off" http://192.168.1.100

===
Add to systemd:

edit /etc/systemd/system/led-http.service
==
[Unit]
Description=LED HTTP Service
After=network.target

[Service]
Type=simple
User=root
WorkingDirectory=/root
ExecStart=/usr/bin/python3 /root/http3.py
Restart=on-failure # or always, on-abort, etc

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
==

start and check:

systemctl daemon-reload
systemctl enable led-http
systemctl start led-http

systemctl status led-http
● led-http.service - LED HTTP Service
   Loaded: loaded (/etc/systemd/system/led-http.service; enabled; vendor preset:
   Active: active (running) since Sun 2018-07-01 09:09:11 UTC; 2min 14s ago
 Main PID: 719 (python3)
   CGroup: /system.slice/led-http.service
           └─719 /usr/bin/python3 /root/http3.py
